Name: Caipiruva
Ingredients: 15 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)
Instructions: MUDDLE lime wedges and grapes in base of shaker to release juices. Add cachaça and sugar. SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice and pour all without straining into glass.
Review: A grape juice laced twist on the Caipirinha.
History: Created by Dale DeGroff, New York, USA.
